hero.title: Speak. Understand. Connect.

join.headingLarge: Understand the world in real time—seamlessly and effortlessly.

joinEventSteps.title: Scan or Enter an Event Code
joinEventSteps.desc: Join live events instantly by scanning a QR code or entering an event code. No hassle, no delays.

joinEventSteps.title: Select Your Language
joinEventSteps.desc: Pick the language you want translations in—our AI ensures smooth and accurate communication.

joinEventSteps.title: Experience Live Translations
joinEventSteps.desc: See real-time subtitles as people speak, or listen to translated speech with our voice-to-voice feature.

joinEventSteps.title: Save & Summarize
joinEventSteps.desc: Need to revisit important discussions? Save translations or generate AI-powered summaries for later.

joinEventSteps.title: Speak Freely, Anytime
joinEventSteps.desc: Use one-on-one conversation mode to communicate effortlessly with anyone, anywhere.

hostEventSteps.title: Create Your Event
hostEventSteps.desc: Log in as an Organization Admin, enter your event details, then generate a unique QR Code and Event Code for easy access.

hostEventSteps.title: Invite Participants
hostEventSteps.desc: Share the QR Code or Event Code with attendees so they can join instantly and experience real-time translations.

hostEventSteps.title: Start Live Translation
hostEventSteps.desc: Begin speaking naturally while our AI-powered system translates instantly. Attendees will see subtitles or hear translations in their chosen language.
